name: Hyper Trip
description:
Hyper Trip is a frenetic reflex game set in a futuristic 3D neon lit environment.

THE CONTROLS?
Tap left or right to guide a square.

THE GOAL?
Avoid hitting a wall.

THE CATCH?
The pace. Dangerous and unforgiving.

THINK YOU CAN HANDLE IT?
Think again.


Hyper Trip features MFi controllers support + full Leaderboards & Game Center integration.
